name: Bombin' Bitches
description:
You ever want a harem of beautiful bishoujos!? You ever want to BLOW THEM UP!? This is the game for you!

Game features:

  • 10 Bodacious Babes!
  • 54 pounds of high-grade explosives!
  • 3 or 4 endings i dont remember which
  • A Little Spinny Ball in the Corner of the Textbox that moves faster when you skip text!
